expected_behavior: Agent begins Phase 1 (Detect) by running 'uv run python skills/add-badges/scripts/detect.py <path>' via Bash
Agent parses the JSON output to identify languages, frameworks, CI/CD, package managers, and tools

Agent reads references/badge-catalog-core.md for base badge definitions

Agent proceeds to Phase 2 (Select) to choose badges matching detected features with dynamic endpoints preferred over static
